about_me.des: I am a software engineer. Familar with Java/Python/Groovy/Bash language.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.redhat3_desc: Responsible for Redhat Middleware RHDM/RHBA(a.k.a BRMS/BPMSuite) productization solution. Developing CI/CD solution based on openstack and deployed to openshift. Keywords -Scrum Master, cross site manager,CI/CD, Jenkins DSL, openshift, docker image, openstack
career.redhat2_desc: Developing CI solution from opensource project to enterprise product for Redhat MiddleWare department. Keywords - Jenkins, Cross timezone collaboration, Python, Makefile, JIRA,  Java, Maven Extension, Bash, Wildfly, Openstack, RHEL
career.redhat1_desc: Developing Integrating and delivering solution for opensource project droolsjbpm to enterprise BRMS/BPMSuite. Keywords - Jboss,Java,Drools,jBPM, Maven, ANT, Gradle, RPM build, Brew
career.cienet_desc: Senior Software engineer in Motorola Mobile platform R&D as contractor. Responsibility included developing for the backend database for Motorola mobile platform. Keywords - DB, SQL, Sqlite, Mobile OS, C
career.yongyou_desc: Software engineer in platform core team and repsponsibility included developing workflow engine and workflow front end. Keywords - BPM/Workflow Engine, JavaScript AJAX,J2EE, Jboss, Tomcat
career.cugb_desc: Study in CUGB University for both master and bachelor degree, 7 years. Worked half year as regular employee in 2000. (Employer:Beijing Dison DongHua, co. Ltd)  Keywords -KaoYan, 1st Prize of Advance Mathematical Competition; CET band 6, Internship in IT company each year
career.cugb_job: Master degree - Computer Science, Bachelor degree - Construction Engineering
career.ltyz_desc: Province Key high school Keywords - Class 2nd score in the College Entrance Exam
